SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.events

Class NotificationSystem

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.events.NotificationSystem
public class NotificationSystem extends Object
Handles sending user notifications for lottery events using FCM API V1. Works with FCM tokens stored in users-p4 collection by MainActivity.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationSystem

      public NotificationSystem(android.content.Context context, String organizerId, String organizerName)
      Constructor for NotificationSystem.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      organizerId - the organizer id (userid)
      organizerName - the organizer name (username)

  • Method Details

    • notifyLotteryWinner

      public void notifyLotteryWinner(User winner, String eventName)
      Sends a "winner" notification to a user when they are selected for an event.
      Parameters:
      winner - User who won the lottery.
      eventName - Name of the event.

    • notifyLotteryLoser

      public void notifyLotteryLoser(User user, String eventName)
      Sends a "not selected" notification to a user.
      Parameters:
      user - User who did not win the lottery.
      eventName - Name of the event.

    • notifyInvitedEntrants

      public void notifyInvitedEntrants(List<User> entrants, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends invitation notification to chosen entrants.
      Parameters:
      entrants - List of users to send notifications to.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      eventId - ID of the event.
      message - Custom message to send.

    • notifyInvitedEntrant

      public void notifyInvitedEntrant(User entrant, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends an individual invitation notification (no logging here).
      Parameters:
      entrant - User to send notification to.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      eventId - ID of the event.
      message - Custom message to send.

    • notifyWaitlistedEntrants

      public void notifyWaitlistedEntrants(List<User> entrants, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends notification to waitlisted entrants with custom message. Works with FCM tokens from users-p4 collection.
      Parameters:
      entrants - List of users to send notifications to.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      eventId - ID of the event.
      message - Custom message to send.

    • notifySelectedEntrants

      public void notifySelectedEntrants(List<User> entrants, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends notification to selected entrants with custom message. Works with FCM tokens from users-p4 collection.
      Parameters:
      entrants - List of users to send notifications to.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      eventId - ID of the event.
      message - Custom message to send.

    • notifyCancelledEntrants

      public void notifyCancelledEntrants(List<User> entrants, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends notification to cancelled entrants with custom message. Works with FCM tokens from users-p4 collection. Add this method to your NotificationSystem class.
      Parameters:
      entrants - List of users to send notifications to.
      eventName - Name of the event.
      eventId - ID of the event.
      message - Custom message to send.

    • notifyAcceptedEntrants

      public void notifyAcceptedEntrants(List<User> entrants, String eventName, String eventId, String message)
      Sends notification to accepted entrants with custom message.
      Parameters:
      entrants - the list of accepted entrants
      eventName - the event name
      eventId - the event id
      message - custom message

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Cleanup method - call this when done with NotificationSystem

    • clearAllNotifications

      public void clearAllNotifications()
      Clears all notifications from the Firestore notification collection. This is useful for testing or cleanup purposes. WARNING: This will permanently delete ALL notification records.
